patterns: can Rafiki help with academic resources?
how does Rafiki support career development?
what are the features of Rafiki's communication tools?
does Rafiki provide guidance on college life?
responses: Rafiki is an online platform specifically designed for FCAI-HU, facilitating communication and collaboration among students, doctors, teaching assistants, managers, graduates, and HR professionals in one centralized place.
It serves as a comprehensive hub for academic resources, fostering seamless communication and offering guidance for career development within FCAI-HU.
Rafiki is instrumental in connecting the FCAI-HU community by providing tools, resources, and communication channels to enhance academic experiences and facilitate career growth.
Rafiki serves as the central platform at FCAI-HU, enabling students, doctors, teaching assistants, managers, graduates, and HR professionals to interact and collaborate efficiently.
At FCAI-HU, Rafiki streamlines communication and collaboration, ensuring a unified platform for students, doctors, teaching assistants, managers, graduates, and HR professionals.

Rafiki's team, led by Marwan Mohamed with Dr. Amr as our consultant, consists of dedicated college students focused on supporting their peers. Together, they provide tailored resources, advanced communication tools, and career guidance for students at FCAI-HU.
Rafiki is accessible to all current students, graduates, doctors, TAs, managers, HR, and others associated with the college.

patterns: How to create an account on rafiki
responses: To log in to Rafiki, go to the official website, click on the 'Log In' button, enter your credentials (username and password) associated with your FCAI-HU account, and you'll gain access to Rafiki's platform.
To access Rafiki, log in using your FCAI-HU credentials on the website's 'Log In' page, ensuring you have an active account within the FCAI-HU system.

To create an account on Rafiki, visit the official website, click on the 'Sign Up' or 'Create Account' option, fill in the required details including your FCAI-HU credentials, and follow the prompts to create your account and access Rafiki.
Rafiki's Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/rafikiFCAIHu
Rafiki's Instagram page: https://www.instagram.com/rafiki_fcai/?utm_source=ig_web_button_share_sheet&igshid=OGQ5ZDc2ODk2ZA==
Contact Rafiki via email: rafiki.questions@gmail.com
You can contact Rafiki via email at rafiki.questions@gmail.com.
Rafiki chat helps students manage their college life effectively by providing information about their academic year, paperwork, schedules, and locations within the college.
Rafiki chat is a flexible and friendly tool designed to support students in various aspects of their educational journey.
Rafiki chat provides information about university schedules and course details.
Your Rafik on you Collage

patterns: how to give feedback to rafiki
responses: We appreciate your feedback! Please email us at feedback@rafiki.com to share your thoughts and suggestions.
Your feedback is valuable to us. You can provide your suggestions to improve Rafiki by emailing us at feedback@rafiki.com.
For any assistance or technical support regarding Rafiki, please reach out to our support team at support@rafiki.com.
Facing issues with Rafiki? Contact our support team at support@rafiki.com for assistance.

Rafiki Chat was created by a dedicated team led by Marwan Mohamed and included Mazen Ahmed, Maria, Mazen Mohamed, Shahd Ahmed, Azza Mohamed, and Mahmoud Fathy. Together, they developed and designed Rafiki Chat to enhance communication and support within the FCAI-HU community.
